targets.query: SELECT (non_negative_derivative(last("cpu_time"), 1s) / 1000000000) FROM "lxcstats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "lxc_host" =~ /^$lxc_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("blkio_write_bytes")) FROM "lxcstats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "lxc_host" =~ /^$lxc_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("bytes_sent")) FROM "lxcstats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "lxc_host" =~ /^$lxc_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("bytes_sent")) FROM "lxcstats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "lxc_host" =~ /^$lxc_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM lxcstats WITH KEY=host

list.label: Container
list.name: lxc_host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM lxcstats WITH KEY=lxc_host WHERE "host"=~/$server/
